title: of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939),
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Further and Higher Education,
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Further and Higher Education, 
Research, Innovation and Science (Transfer of Departmental Administration 
and Ministerial Functions) Order 2023. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 1 June 2023.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited higher education research innovation science (transfer departmental administration ministerial functions) order 2023 (2) order come operation 1 june 2023

title: of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939),
heading: 2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise,
text_raw:
2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise, 
performance or execution of any functions transferred by Article 3 are 
transferred to the Department of Further and Higher Education, Research, 
Innovation and Science. 

(2) References to the Department of Education contained in any Act or any 
instrument made under such Act and relating to any administration and 
business transferred by paragraph (1) shall, from the commencement of this 
Order, be construed as references to the Department of Further and Higher 
Education, Research, Innovation and Science.
text_norm: 2 (1) administration business connection exercise performance execution function transferred article 3 transferred department higher education research innovation science (2) reference department education contained act instrument made act relating administration business transferred paragraph (1) shall commencement order construed reference department higher education research innovation science

title: of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939),
heading: 3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Education –
text_raw:
3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Education – 

(a) 

by or under the provisions of an Act specified in column (1) of 
the Schedule, to the extent specified in column (2) of the 
Schedule opposite the mention of the Act so specified, and 

(b) under Article 18(5), paragraphs (1) and (2) of Article 19 and 
Article 21 of the Dublin Dental Hospital Establishment Order 
1963 (S.I. No. 129 of 1963), 

are transferred to the Minister for Further and Higher Education, Research, 
Innovation and Science. 

(2) References to the Minister for Education contained in any Act or 
instrument made under such Act and relating to any functions transferred by 
paragraph (1) shall, from the commencement of this Order, be construed as 
references to the Minister for Further and Higher Education, Research, 
Innovation and Science.

title: of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939),
heading: 4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal
text_raw:
4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal 
proceedings are pending to which the Minister for Education is a party and the 
proceedings have reference to functions transferred by this Order to the 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 2nd June, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [291] 3 

Minister for Further and Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science, 
the name of the Minister for Further and Higher Education, Research, 
Innovation and Science shall, in so far as the proceedings relate to any 
functions transferred by this Order, be substituted in the proceedings for that of 
the Minister for Education or added in the proceedings, as may be appropriate, 
and the proceedings shall not abate by reason of such substitution.

title: of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939),
heading: 5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or
text_raw:
5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or 
under the authority of the Minister for Education may, in so far as it relates to a 
function transferred by this Order to the Minister for Further and Higher 
Education, Research, Innovation and Science, be carried on or completed on or 
after such commencement by the Minister for Further and Higher Education, 
Research, Innovation and Science.
text_norm: 5 anything commenced commencement order authority minister education may far relates function transferred order minister higher education research innovation science carried completed commencement minister higher education research innovation science

title: of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939),
heading: 6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made
text_raw:
6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made 
in the performance of a function transferred by this Order shall, if and insofar 
as it was operative immediately before the commencement of this Order, have 
effect from such commencement as if it had been granted or made by the 
Minister for Further and Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science.
text_norm: 6 every document (including certificate licence) granted made performance function transferred order shall insofar operative immediately commencement order effect commencement granted made minister higher education research innovation science

title: of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939),
heading: 7. References to the Minister for Education contained in the constitution
text_raw:
7. References to the Minister for Education contained in the constitution 
of any company and relating to any function transferred by this Order shall, 
from the commencement of this Order, be construed as references to the 
Minister for Further and Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science.
text_norm: 7 reference minister education contained constitution company relating function transferred order shall commencement order construed reference minister higher education research innovation science

title: of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939),
heading: 8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before
text_raw:
8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before 
the commencement of this Order by the Minister for Education in connection 
with the functions transferred by this Order are transferred to the Minister for 
Further and Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science and, 
accordingly, without any further conveyance, transfer or assignment, on such 
commencement – 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

that property, both real and personal, vests in the Minister for 
Further and Higher Education, Research, Innovation and 
Science, 

those rights shall be enjoyed by the Minister for Further and 
Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science, and 

those liabilities are liabilities of the Minister for Further and 
Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science. 

(2) All moneys, stocks, shares and securities transferred to the Minister for 
Further and Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science by this 
Article which, on the commencement of this Order, are standing in the name of 
the Minister for Education shall, on the request of the Minister for Further and 
Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science be transferred into the 
name of the Minister for Further and Higher Education, Research, Innovation 
and Science. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [291]
